title: These ChatGPT Rivals Are Designed to Play With Your Emotions
description: Startups building chatbots tuned for emotionally engaged conversation say they can offer support, companionship—and even romance.

title: LinkedIn Turns 20. Its Next Career Move: A Big AI Push
description: The social network has survived by rebuilding itself from the ground up several times. Its latest project aims to help users with ChatGPT-like “copilots.”

title: Joe Biden Wants Hackers’ Help to Keep AI Chatbots In Check
description: The White House will support an event at the Defcon security conference this summer that challenges experts to uncover flaws in generative AI systems.
